hp-smallText: Food waste is a big problem, and we can be a solution. Good Mood! is the website that lets you rescue unsold food from an untimely fate at your favorite spots.
hp-app-feature1: Explore shops and resturants in your area
hp-app-feature2: Save surprise bags of food from wasting in good price
hp-info-heading: More than 1/3 of all food is being wasted
hp-info-item1-text: Food waste is responsible of 10% of greenhouse gas emissions(that's more than the whole aviation industry)
hp-info-item2-text: We waste 2.5 billion tonnes of food annualy, while 828 million people go hungry every day
hp-info-item3-text: Wasting food costs us $1.2 trillion each year
hp-about-text: Feeling hungry? With the good food. Good Mood! website, you can eat well while making an impact. Save surprise bagsof good food at an even better price from resturants and shops near you.
hp-about-item1: Rescue good food from local favourites
hp-about-item2: Enjoy for 1/2 of the original price
hp-about-item3: Help the planet by preventing waste
hp-footer-heading: Get connected with us on social networks
footer_title: Food waste is a big problem, and we can be a solution. Good Mood! is the website that lets you rescue unsold food from an untimely fate at your favorite spots.
